verses.name: Psalms 145:13
verses.text: Thy kingdom is an everlasting kingdom, and thy dominion endureth throughout all generations.

verses.name: Psalms 145:14
verses.text: The Lord upholdeth all that fall, and raiseth up all those that be bowed down.

verses.name: Psalms 145:15
verses.text: The eyes of all wait upon thee; and thou givest them their meat in due season.

verses.name: Psalms 145:16
verses.text: Thou openest thine hand, and satisfiest the desire of every living thing.

verses.name: Psalms 145:17
verses.text: The Lord is righteous in all his ways, and holy in all his works.

verses.name: Psalms 145:18
verses.text: The Lord is nigh unto all them that call upon him, to all that call upon him in truth.
